subject: Serious Delays in land acquisition; leading to huge losses to NHAI.
text: HRav vzfy  TTHNf gifeaprot 744 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (87 TRee7 &_{oTTf 47q4) 5477 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 & 6, Na2r-10 , aRTT, 7 feeri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelinesl Contract Management/ 2020 No. 7. 1.65/2020 dated the 21st 2020 Sub Serious Delays in land acquisition, leading to huge losses to NHAI: It is a very serious matter that non handing over of encumbrance free & hindrance free land by PDs has lead to majority of the arbitration & litigation cases, due to which NHAI has already incurred losses worth thousands of crores. This has to stop immediately. 2 In future, the stipulated land will be acquired and handed over encumbrance free & hindrance free to the Contractor/ Concessionaire in time, or that part of the project will be descoped, or the project will be cancelled, if the land is not handed over, but in no case this issue will be kept pending, which will later on lead to huge claims/ arbitration/ litigation, which will end Up in huge financial loss to NHAI . 3_ From now onwards, every PD will daily devote adequate time to the issue of acquisition of land and handing over to the Contractor/ Concessionaire, till 100% land in every project is handed over. PD will also fill data in Data Lake/ PMS Portal; RO will daily monitor every PDs progress in this matter; Concerned CGM(T) & Member will monitor the progress twice a week and brief Chairman once a week about the progress of each project. 4. This task must be given priority by PDs and all concerned officers of PIU and RO. Most strict action will be taken if the remaining land is not handed over in the minimum possible time by making daily efforts. 5 Also, the Appointed Dates of the projects, henceforth, may be declared only after the Contractor/ Concessionaire certifies about the availability of un-encumbered & unhindered length in the prescribed format. (Sukhbir Singh Sandhu) Chairman All ROs & PDs to: All Members CGM(TJs of Tech. Divisions CGM(IT) '%1 RTR1 HI MHAL May, top Copy
